Summary: Tastiest bar ever but not so good on protein
Text:
Amazon has the best price on this product. I used to buy one or two at Starbucks, which is of course horrendously expensive. Then, I found it at Trader Joes, better price but still expensive. Amazon has the best price.
Now, onto the product. It tastes great, not extremely sweet. But, if you are looking for protein, this is not for you. I am addicted to it now, but sometimes I regret ever tasting it...
